movies.title: Charlie's Angels
movies.Plot: Three private investigators are assigned to track down a kidnapped software engineer, but the case isn't as straightforward as it seems.

movies.title: Main Hoon Na
movies.Plot: An army major goes undercover as a college student. His mission is both professional and personal: to protect his general's daughter from a radical militant, and to find his estranged half-brother.

movies.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
movies.Plot: A husband and wife struggle to keep their marriage alive until they realize they are both secretly working as assassins. Now, their respective assignments require them to kill each other.

movies.title: Bon Cop, Bad Cop
movies.Plot: Two Canadian detectives, one from Ontario and the other from Quebec, must work together when a murdered victim is found on the Ontario-Quebec border.

movies.title: Tashan
movies.Plot: What happens when you throw 2 guys who hate each other together? Add for good measure a beauty and a gangster and the trouble is no one can be trusted.

movies.title: Pineapple Express
movies.Plot: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witnesses his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.

movies.title: The A-Team
movies.Plot: A group of Iraq War veterans look to clear their name with the U.S. Military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

movies.title: 30 Minutes or Less
movies.Plot: Two fledgling criminals kidnap a pizza delivery guy, strap a bomb to his chest, and inform him that he has mere hours to rob a bank or else...

movies.title: Hit & Run
movies.Plot: Four friends hit a man while driving and must dispose of the body.

movies.title: Chennai Express
movies.Plot: A man travelling to Rameswaram via Chennai express for his late grandfather's ashes immersion finds himself in trouble after helping a don's daughter and her cousins board the train.

movies.title: This Is the End
movies.Plot: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves.

movies.title: Kick
movies.Plot: An adrenaline junkie walks away from a whirlwind romance and embraces a new life as a thief, though he soon finds himself pursued by veteran police officer and engaged in a turf war with a local gangster.

movies.title: Happy New Year
movies.Plot: A gang of amateur dancers takes part in a dancing competition to avenge their personal vendetta.

movies.title: The Do-Over
movies.Plot: Two down-on-their-luck guys decide to fake their own deaths and start over with new identities, only to find the people they're pretending to be are in even deeper trouble.

movies.title: The Brothers Grimsby
movies.Plot: A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother.

movies.title: True Memoirs of an International Assassin
movies.Plot: After a publisher changes a writer's debut novel about a deadly assassin from fiction to non-fiction, the author finds himself thrust into the world of his lead character, and must take on the role of his character for his own sur...

movies.title: Okja
movies.Plot: A young girl risks everything to prevent a powerful, multinational company from kidnapping her best friend - a fascinating beast named Okja.

movies.title: Bon Cop Bad Cop 2
movies.Plot: A francophone S.Q. officer and an anglophone O.P.P officer reunite to investigate a large car theft ring led by an Italian mobster.

movies.title: One 2 Ka 4
movies.Plot: When a cop's partner is killed in the line of duty, he assumed guardianship of his orphaned children while investigating the murder.

movies.title: Oh Darling Yeh Hai India
movies.Plot: Miss India and an aspiring actor spend a night together roaming the streets of Mumbai and unwittingly clash paths with a megalomaniacal gangster planning to take over India.

movies.title: Game Over, Man!
movies.Plot: Three friends are on the verge of getting their video game financed when their benefactor is taken hostage by terrorists.

movies.title: Undercover Grandpa
movies.Plot: When the girl he likes goes missing, Jake enlists the help of his grandpa and Grandpa's former special ops buddies.

movies.title: America: The Motion Picture
movies.Plot: A chainsaw-wielding George Washington teams with beer-loving bro Sam Adams to take down the Brits in a tongue-in-cheek riff on the American Revolution.

movies.title: The Christmas Chronicles
movies.Plot: The story of sister and brother, Kate and Teddy Pierce, whose Christmas Eve plan to catch Santa Claus on camera turns into an unexpected journey that most kids could only dream about.

movies.title: Coffee & Kareem
movies.Plot: Twelve-year-old Kareem Manning hires a criminal to scare his mom's new boyfriend -police officer James Coffee - but it backfires, forcing Coffee and Kareem to team up in order to save themselves from Detroit's most ruthless drug k...

movies.title: Malibu Rescue
movies.Plot: Aspiring junior lifeguards compete against snobby local kids for bragging rights and the ultimate tower at Malibu Beach, California.

movies.title: Psychokinesis
movies.Plot: After drinking water from a mountain spring, a bank security guard gains telekinetic superpowers, which he must use to save his estranged daughter from an evil construction company, as a superhero.

movies.title: The Monkey King
movies.Plot: Inspired by an epic Chinese tale, translated into an action-packed comedy, a Monkey and his magical fighting Stick battle demons, dragons, gods and the greatest adversary of all - Monkey's ego.

movies.title: The Sleepover
movies.Plot: When two siblings discover their seemingly normal mom is a former thief in witness protection who has been forced to pull one last job, they team up to rescue her over the course of an action-packed night.

movies.title: Murder Mystery
movies.Plot: A New York cop and his wife go on a European vacation to reinvigorate the spark in their marriage, but end up getting framed and on the run for the death of an elderly billionaire.

movies.title: Pets United
movies.Plot: A group of spoilt, selfish pets led by glamour cat Belle are stranded in their luxury hangout 'Pampered Pets,' when the machines that run Robo City, the hypermodern metropolis that they live in, go wild and take over.

movies.title: Next Gen
movies.Plot: A friendship with a top-secret robot turns a lonely girl's life into a thrilling adventure as they take on bullies, evil bots and a scheming madman.

movies.title: The Christmas Chronicles: Part Two
movies.Plot: Kate Pierce, now a cynical teen, is unexpectedly reunited with Santa Claus when a mysterious troublemaker threatens to cancel Christmas--forever.

movies.title: We Can Be Heroes
movies.Plot: When alien invaders capture the Earth's superheroes, their kids must learn to work together to save their parents and the planet.

movies.title: Spenser Confidential
movies.Plot: When two Boston police officers are murdered, ex-cop Spenser teams up with his no-nonsense roommate Hawk to take down criminals.

movies.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Movie
movies.Plot: When a mysterious stranger arrives from the future with a dire warning, Leo is forced to rise and lead his brothers, Raph, Donnie, and Mikey in a fight to save the world from a terrifying alien species.

movies.title: Beverly Hills Cop: Axel F
movies.Plot: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills after his daughter's life is threatened for a family reunion that includes old pals John Taggart and Billy Rosewood to uncover a conspiracy.

movies.title: Thunder Force
movies.Plot: In a world where supervillains are commonplace, two estranged childhood best friends reunite after one devises a treatment that gives them powers to protect their city.

movies.title: Red Notice
movies.Plot: An Interpol agent successfully tracks down the world's most wanted art thief with help from a rival thief. But nothing is as it seems as a series of double-crosses ensues.

movies.title: Malibu Rescue: The Next Wave
movies.Plot: It's summer again, and everyone's favorite Junior Rescuers, The Flounders, are back at Tower 2. With the International Junior Rescue Championships headed to Southern California, the eyes of the entire planet are on Malibu Beach. B...

movies.title: Day Shift
movies.Plot: A hard-working, blue-collar dad just wants to provide a good life for his quick-witted 10-year-old daughter. His mundane San Fernando Valley pool cleaning job is a front for his real source of income: hunting and killing vampires.

movies.title: The Out-Laws
movies.Plot: A straight-laced bank manager about to marry the love of his life. When his bank is held up by infamous Ghost Bandits during his wedding week, he believes his future in-laws who just arrived in town, are the infamous Out-Laws.

movies.title: Ne Zha
movies.Plot: Born with unique powers, a boy is recruited to fight demons and save the community that fears him.

movies.title: Murder Mystery 2
movies.Plot: Full-time detectives Nick and Audrey are struggling to get their private eye agency off the ground. They find themselves at the center of international abduction when their friend Maharaja is kidnapped at his own lavish wedding.

movies.title: Chicken Run: Dawn of the Nugget
movies.Plot: Having pulled off an escape from Tweedy's farm, Ginger has found a peaceful island sanctuary for the whole flock. But back on the mainland the whole of chicken-kind faces a new threat, and Ginger and her team decide to break in.

movies.title: Face Off
movies.Plot: When he discovers a fortune in diamonds in the jungle, a man must flee the criminal gang with the help of a chance acquaintance.

movies.title: Face Off 2: The Studio
movies.Plot: Two brothers help a triad boss to smuggle illegal goods in exchange for their film fund. However, they soon discover that they have fallen into a trap set by the triad.

movies.title: The Lovebirds
movies.Plot: A couple (Issa Rae and Kumail Nanjiani) experiences a defining moment in their relationship when they are unintentionally embroiled in a murder mystery.

movies.title: The Man from Toronto
movies.Plot: The world's deadliest assassin and New York's biggest screw-up are mistaken for each other at an Airbnb rental.

movies.title: Fearless
movies.Plot: A teen gamer is forced to level up to full-time babysitter when his favorite video game drops three superpowered infants from space into his backyard.

movies.title: The Last Mercenary
movies.Plot: A mysterious former secret service agent must urgently return to France when his estranged son is falsely accused of arms and drug trafficking by the government, following a blunder by an overzealous bureaucrat and a mafia operation.

movies.title: Saakini Daakini
movies.Plot: Two police trainees witness the kidnapping of a girl one night on their way home. Unable to get help from the local police and determined to rescue the girl, they set out on their own amateur investigation.

movies.title: All Because of You
movies.Plot: After falling for a guest, an unsuspecting hotel staff becomes embroiled in a hostage scheme and discovers true love in an unlikely place.

movies.title: Wingwomen
movies.Plot: Tired of the risks involved in a life of crime, two expert thieves and best friends recruit feisty Sam to assist them with one last job before they move to a new, and less stressful, line of work.

movies.title: The Union
movies.Plot: Construction worker Mike is thrust into the world of espionage when his high school sweetheart, Roxanne, recruits him for a high-stakes intelligence mission.

movies.title: Back in Action
movies.Plot: Former CIA spies Emily and Matt are pulled back into espionage after their secret identities are exposed.

movies.title: The Adam Project
movies.Plot: After accidentally crash-landing in 2022, time-traveling fighter pilot Adam Reed teams up with his 12-year-old self for a mission to save the future.

movies.title: The Pirates: The Last Royal Treasure
movies.Plot: In the Joseon era, a brave crew of pirates and bandits brave the rough waters and try to decipher the clues to find the lost royal gold before their rivals do.

movies.title: Chick Fight
movies.Plot: When Anna Wyncomb is introduced to an underground, all-female fight club in order to turn the mess of her life around, she discovers she is much more personally connected to the history of the club than she could ever imagine.

movies.title: The Big 4
movies.Plot: An idealistic detective is getting into an unexpected world of violence and chaos after her father is found murdered under mysterious circumstances.

movies.title: The Paper Tigers
movies.Plot: Three Kung Fu prodigies have grown into washed-up, middle-aged men, now one kick away from pulling their hamstrings. But when their master is murdered, they must juggle their dead-end jobs, dad duties, and old grudges to avenge hi...

movies.title: Seal Team
movies.Plot: Fearless seal Quinn assembles a squad of misfit recruits to stand up to ruthless sharks with razor-sharp teeth and reclaim the open sea.

movies.title: Astérix & Obélix: The Middle Kingdom
movies.Plot: The only daughter of the Chinese emperor Han Xuandi escapes from a strict prince and seeks help from the Gauls and the two brave warriors Asterix and Obelix.

movies.title: Queens on the Run
movies.Plot: When four women finally take the road trip they planned in high school, they have no idea of the things they'll bump into sometimes literally.

movies.title: The Mitchells vs. The Machines
movies.Plot: A quirky, dysfunctional family's road trip is upended when they find themselves in the middle of the robot apocalypse and suddenly become humanity's unlikeliest last hope.

movies.title: Amigos
movies.Plot: Three nearly-identical men become fast friends after meeting via an online doppelgänger-finding app. It's all fun and games until one of them turns out to be a notorious fugitive.

movies.title: The Takedown
movies.Plot: Diakité and Monge are police officers who are complete opposites, and get paired together to uncover an unexpectedly big criminal case.

movies.title: THE FABLE
movies.Plot: Trained as a ruthless assassin since childhood, a mob hitman is ordered to become a normal law-abiding citizen.

movies.title: Seoul Vibe
movies.Plot: The drivers of the Sanggye-dong Supreme Team become mired in the slush fund investigation of a powerful person on the very day of the 1988 Seoul Olympics opening ceremony.

movies.title: Lift
movies.Plot: Follows a master thief and his Interpol Agent ex-girlfriend who team up to steal $500 million in gold bullion being transported on an A380 passenger flight.

movies.title: City Hunter
movies.Plot: An exceptional marksman and hopeless playboy, private eye Ryo Saeba reluctantly forms an alliance with his late partner's sister to investigate his death.

movies.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
movies.Plot: Three generations of women fight back against those who could take everything from them.

movies.title: Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead
movies.Plot: A worker in a foreign finance company is bullied and worked around the clock, before a zombie outbreak finally makes him feel alive.

movies.title: Watch Out, We're Mad
movies.Plot: After a tied first place in a local stunt race, two drivers start a contest to decide which of them will own the prize, a dune buggy. But when a mobster destroys the car, they are determined to get it back.

movies.title: Minnal Murali
movies.Plot: A tailor gains special powers after being struck by lightning, but must take down an unexpected foe if he is to become the superhero his hometown needs.

movies.title: Big Nunu's Little Heist
movies.Plot: An ex-soldier turned deliveryman is dragged into a local kingpin's bumbling gang to pull off a daring heist in an infamous South African township.

movies.title: KPop Demon Hunters
movies.Plot: A world-renowned K-Pop girl group balance their lives in the spotlight with their secret identities as demon hunters.

movies.title: THE FABLE: The Killer Who Doesn't Kill
movies.Plot: The Fable/Akira Sato killed 5 men 4 years ago. He meets the girl injured back then in a wheelchair. She's staying with the 6th on his kill list canceled last moment. The 6th is now scamming/extorting people.

movies.title: DSP
movies.Plot: A flower seller's son ends up in a tussle with a ruthless rowdy in Dindigul, forcing him to become a policeman and fight the odds.

movies.title: Kuttey
movies.Plot: A van carrying cash on a rainy night in the outskirts of Mumbai is the crosshairs of three separate gangs all with the same plan. Now that they've crossed paths who will survive?

movies.title: An Action Hero
movies.Plot: A murder accusation turns a movie star's own life into an eccentric action thriller as he flees the country, with a vengeful politician hot on his heels.

movies.title: Meter
movies.Plot: Arjun Kalyan reluctantly becomes a police officer to fulfill his father's dream, then an unexpected turn of events forces him to go head-to-head with the home minister of the state.

movies.title: The Getaway King
movies.Plot: An action-crime-comedy set in the last days of communism in Poland; a story of folk-hero thief Naymro, who escaped from the police 29 times and lived on his own terms until love and the collapsing Berlin Wall changed everything.

movies.title: Thallumaala
movies.Plot: Follows a youngster ready to get married, but funny events happen and changes his plans.

movies.title: Spy Kids: Armageddon
movies.Plot: The children of the world's greatest secret agents unwittingly help a powerful game developer unleash a computer virus that gives him control of all technology, leading them to become spies themselves to save their parents and the...

movies.title: Shehzada
movies.Plot: Bantu is hated by his father Valmiki since he was a toddler. Samara, his boss, shows him affection and love until he discovers that the Jindals are his parents. Bantu decides to seek Jindals love and protect them from threats they...

movies.title: Fast & Feel Love
movies.Plot: When a world champion of sport stacking is dumped by his long-time girlfriend, he has to learn basic adulting skills in order to live alone and take care of himself.

movies.title: Japan
movies.Plot: A daring robbery in a jewellery showroom kickstarts the hunt for Japan, a notorious robber, who is a law unto himself.

movies.title: Rangabali
movies.Plot: A carefree young man gets caught up in a local dispute after falling for a medical student.

movies.title: All-Time High
movies.Plot: A con artist in dire need of cash and a woman with a crypto fortune hit it off. Is she the target of his dreams, or is the scammer about to get scammed?

movies.title: Revolver Rita
movies.Plot: N/A

movies.Plot: A wealthy family faces numerous problems and reunites with their long-lost relatives to pray to their deity for solutions, unaware it will reawaken the feud between a classical dancer, Chandramukhi and Vettaiyan Raja from centurie...

movies.title: Almost Cops
movies.Plot: A dedicated special investigator is forced to team up with a reckless demoted ex-detective to hunt down a killer in this buddy cop comedy.

movies.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutant Mayhem
movies.Plot: The Turtle brothers work to earn the love of New York City while facing down an army of mutants.

movies.title: Tillu Square
movies.Plot: One year after a love affair entangled him in a murder case, a hapless DJ has a one-night stand that leads to even messier kerfuffles tied to his past.

movies.title: Nice Girls
movies.Plot: When Léo's brother Ludo is killed in Hamburg, despite orders she partners with German cop Mélanie to investigate. Unbeknownst to them, Nice faces a threat and they share an unknown connection.

movies.title: Jack
movies.Plot: An unconventional anti-terrorist operative must defy his bosses in order to foil a devastating attack on his nation in this action thriller.

movies.title: Marry My Dead Body
movies.Plot: One day a police officer finds a red wedding envelope, only to find out that the owner is in fact a ghost asking for the officer's hand in marriage before reincarnation. What will happen when a human and a ghost form a special bond?

movies.title: Freelance
movies.Plot: An ex-special forces operative takes a job to provide security for a journalist as she interviews a dictator, but when a military coup breaks out in the middle of the interview, they are forced to escape into the jungle.

movies.title: Officer Black Belt
movies.Plot: A talented martial artist who can't walk past a person in need unites with a probation officer to fight and prevent crime as a martial arts officer.

movies.title: Bogeyman
movies.Plot: A pharmacist doctor falls in love with a criminal who decides to repent and leave criminality, and together with his friend, faces many situations that turn the course of events upside down.

movies.title: Trouble
movies.Plot: Conny, a divorced salesman, gets wrongfully imprisoned for murder. There, he meets criminals who mistake him for a pilot like his ex-wife's new boyfriend. Chaos ensues as he navigates life behind bars while separated from his daug...

movies.title: Gold Rush Gang
movies.Plot: At the tail end of World War II, a bandit leader and his crew go up against his sworn enemy and the Japanese army to rob a train full of gold.

movies.title: Rifle Club
movies.Plot: A historic rifle club faces a vengeful arms dealer's gang in the Western Ghats. Skilled hunters fight to survive and protect their legacy.

movies.title: Magik Rompak
movies.Plot: A skilled magician recruits an unlikely team for a daring heist to acquire a valuable gem. As they navigate their intertwined histories and escalating stakes, they must master deception, confront vulnerabilities.

movies.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
movies.Plot: When the discovery of an ancient artifact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must join forces to protect their home and save the world from a second ice age.

movies.title: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
movies.Plot: When their late police captain gets linked to drug cartels, wisecracking Miami cops Mike Lowrey and Marcus Burnett embark on a dangerous mission to clear his name.

movies.title: Breaking and Re-entering
movies.Plot: An invincible theft group led by Chang Bojun, who secretly carried out a 1 billion yuan theft case on New Year's Eve. Unexpectedly, they encountered a gang robbing gang, and Chang's ex-girlfriend was accidentally involved in the c...

movies.title: Mission: Cross
movies.Plot: In the ultimate test of marriage, an agent-turned-househusband gets tangled in a perilous mission with his detective wife, who's clueless about his past.

movies.title: Cells At Work!
movies.Plot: Each and every body is a legion of cells, all performing their function to keep their owner operating.

movies.title: Mad Square
movies.Plot: Three college buddies navigate their way through campus life, leading to wild adventures and laugh-out-loud moments.

movies.title: Mathu Vadalara 2
movies.Plot: Babu and Yesu, former delivery agents, embark on a thrilling mission as special agents, facing extraordinary challenges with humor, surprises, and nonstop excitement.

movies.title: Bank Chor
movies.Plot: A comic-caper, that tells the story of 3 morons trying to rob a bank who pick the worst day possible when everything that can go wrong, goes wrong and how they're inadvertently caught in the crossfire.
